resources.string: You haven\'t added a lesson yet!
Get started by clicking the plus sign on the top menu. You\'ll be reminded of the things you\'ve learned every now and then
You can always bring back lessons that you chose to forget

Long version of the story goes here
How did you come to the conclusion?
Full explanation of lesson
etc
Lesson back in list of lessons
You forgot to enter what you learned!

Start adding things you constantly need reminding of.
Any small or big thing will do.

Every couple of days you will be reminded of a random lesson you recorded.
After a couple of weeks you will start becoming like an elephant
